name: Compressed Video Surveillance Project
summary: A JVSGZ file is a compressed project file created by JVSG's CCTV (Closed-Circuit Television) system design programs. It stores a .JVSG file compressed with Zip compression. JVSGZ files are used to store camera locations, camera view angles, bandwidth, hard disk calculations, and other CCTV design information.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: JVSG IP Video System Design Tool
